topic.title: Bull & Bones Brewhaus
topic.shortdesc: Bull & Bones does not have terrible ranch! Bull & Bones also does not have great ranch.

body.p: I have ordered ranch at a lot of different places, and based on experience, I always expect steakhouses to have fantastic ranch. I guess Bull & Bones is technically a Brewhaus, though, which makes sense because their ranch is just not fantastic. The consistency is fine, but the flavor is lacking and the portions are small. I don't have any specific qualms with this ranch, it just doesn't amaze me.

fig.title: Bull & Bones: Not the best, not the worst

image.alt: Image of the outside of Bull & Bones Brewhaus

body.p: The menu at this restaurant implies a fantastic ranch, and it does not offer a fantastic ranch. It does offer a good ranch, though. If you are normal and enjoy ranch regardless of it being perfect on my scale, head on down to Bull & Bones Brewhaus to enjoy the fourth best ranch in Blacksburg.
